name: Ghost Dodger
description:
The third game in my game a week project. Delivered a day late and without sound! This week was harder than the last two. Made also for the GB Jam 5 but not submitted on time!

The goal of the game is to collect the 5 spooky tomes hidden throughout the spooky house while avoiding getting touched by spooky ghosts! so spooky!

Use the arrow keys to move.
